{{also|爱谁谁}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=爱谁谁|type=12}}

===Etymology===
[[愛]] (to [[care]] [[about]]) + [[誰誰]] ([[whoever]])

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=ài shéishéi
|cat=ph
}}

===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[whatever]]; [[who]] [[care]]s; I [[don't]] [[care]]
#: [[甲]]： [[你]][[這樣]][[下去]][[很]][[多]][[人]][[都]][[會]][[對]][[你]][[失望]][[的]]。
#: [[乙]]： '''愛誰誰'''！[[我]][[沒]][[時間]][[聽]][[你]][[廢話]]。
#:: ''A: If you do this many people will be [[disappointed]] in you.''
#:: ''B: '''Whatever'''! I don't have time to listen to this [[nonsense]].''
